Name: srcip
Description: Source IP address

Name: sport
Description: Source port number

Name: dstip
Description: Destination IP address

Name: dsport
Description: Destination port number

Name: proto
Description: Transaction protocol

Name: state .
Description: Indicates to the state and its dependent protocol

Name: dur
Description: Record total duration

Name: sbytes
Description: Source to destination transaction bytes

Name: dbytes
Description: Destination to source transaction bytes

Name: sttl
Description: Source to destination time to live value

Name: dttl
Description: Destination to source time to live value

Name: sloss
Description: Source packets retransmitted or dropped

Name: dloss
Description: Destination packets retransmitted or dropped

Name: service
Description: http ftp smtp ssh dns ftp - data

Name: Sload
Description: Source bits per second

Name: Dload
Description: Destination bits per second

Name: Spkts
Description: Source to destination packet count

Name: Dpkts
Description: Destination to source packet count

Name: swin
Description: Source TCP window advertisement value

Name: dwin
Description: Destination TCP window advertisement value

Name: stcpb
Description: Source TCP base sequence number

Name: dtcpb
Description: Destination TCP base sequence number

Name: smeansz
Description: Mean of the ? ow packet size transmitted by the sre

Name: dmeansz
Description: Mean of the ? ow packet size transmitted by the dst

Name: trans_depth
Description:
Represents the pipelined depth into the connection of
http request / response transaction

Name: res_bdy_len .
Description:
Actual uncompressed content size of the data transferred
from the servers http service .

Name: Sjit
Description: Source jitter ( mSec )

Name: Djit
Description: Destination jitter ( mSec )

Name: Stime
Description: record start time

Name: Ltime
Description: record last time

Name: Sintpkt
Description: Source interpacket arrival time ( mSec )

Name: Dintpkt
Description: Destination interpacket arrival time ( mSec )

Name: tcprtt
Description: TCP connection setup round - trip time , the sum of synack and ackdat .

Name: synack
Description: TCP connection setup time the time between the SYN and the SYN_ACK packets .

Name: ackdat
Description: TCP connection setup time the time between the SYN_ACK and the ACK packets .

Name: is_sm_ips_ports
Description:
If source ( 1 ) and destination ( 3 ) IP addresses equal and port numbers ( 2 ) ( 4 )
equal thenthis variable takes value 1 else 0

Name: ct_state_ttl
Description:
No. for each state ( 6 ) according to specific range of values
for source / destination time to live ( 10 ) ( 11 ) .

Name: ct_flw_http_mthd
Description: No. of flows that has methods such as Get and Post in http service .

Name: is_ftp_login
Description: If the ftp session is accessed by user and password then 1 else 0 .

Name: ct_ftp_cmd
Description: No of flows that has a command in ftp session .

Name: ct srv_src
Description:
No. of connections that contain the same service ( 14 ) and
source address ( 1 ) in 100 connections according to the last time ( 26 ) .

Name: ct_srv_dst
Description:
No. of connections that contain the same service ( 14 ) and destination address
( 3 ) in 100 connections according to the last time ( 26 ) .

Name: ct_dst_ltm
Description:
No. of connections of the same destination address ( 3 ) in 100
connections according to the last time ( 26 ) .

Name: ct_src . ltm
Description:
No. of connections of the same source address ( 1 ) in 100
connections according to the last time ( 26 ) .

Name: ct_src_dport_ltm
Description:
No of connections of the same source address ( 1 ) and the
destination port ( 4 ) in 100 connections according to the last time ( 26 ) .

Name: ct_dst_sport_ltm
Description:
No of connections of the same destination address ( 3 ) and the
source port ( 2 ) in 100 connections according to the last time ( 26 ) .

Name: ct_dst_src_ltm
Description:
No of connections of the same source ( 1 ) and the destination ( 3 )
address in in 100 connections according to the last time ( 26 ) .

Name: attack_cat
Description:
The name of each attack category . In this data set nine categories eg
Fuzzers Analysis Backdoors DOS exploits Generic Reconnaissance
Shellcode and Worms

Name: Label
Description: 0 for normal and 1 for attack records
